text.0: for the celestial race this song of praise which gives wealth lavishly.
text.1: was made by singers with their lips.
text.2: they who for indra with their mind formed horses harnessed by a word.
text.4: they for the two nāsatyas wrought a light car moving every way.
text.6: the Ṛbhus with effectual prayers honest with constant labour made.
text.7: their sire and mother young again.
text.8: together came your gladdening drops with indra by the maruts girt.
text.9: with the Ādityas with the kings.
text.10: the sacrificial ladle wrought newly by the god tvaṣṭars hand.
text.11: four ladles have ye made thereof.
text.12: vouchsafe us wealth to him who pours thrice seven libations yea to each.
text.13: give wealth pleased with our eulogies.
text.14: as ministering priests they held by pious acts they won themselves.
text.15: a share in sacrifice with gods.
